Freq starts out in a small high school team but as the story progresses he will move first to a college team and later the NBA. The ultimate goal is to become one of the greatest players of all time. Before starting out it is possible to customize the appearance of the player and to choose a position and scoring style. Games in the career modes only involve controlling one player with the others being AI driven.

game.name: NBA 2K18
game.desc: Write your own narrative, build your dream team, take control of the league, or prove you're the best by competing against other players from around the globe.

game.name: Nba 2k6
game.desc: NBA 2K6 on Xbox 360 is a full-featured basketball game with a multitude of different modes and options. Decide on the life of the next superstar with 24/7 mode, which allows you to create your own player from the ground up, and follow his or her development in the NBA. Take on teams in the streets, impose your style of play and earn money to buy music, jerseys, players...

game.name: Nba 2k7
game.desc: NBA 2K7 is a basketball game for Xbox 360. Choose from teams in the Eastern and Western American conferences to achieve the best possible performance and reach the coveted play-offs. It's up to you to produce the best game on the court, both in single player and in online mode. There's also the option to compete in street matches, while 24/7 mode takes you through a series of challenges.

game.name: Nba 2k8
game.desc: NBA 2K8 on Xbox 360 is a basketball simulation featuring the biggest names in the famous American league. This 2008 version comes with a lot of new features: a dunk contest, a reworked handling, new game styles, a redesigned camera system, evolved defensive controls... Everything has been redesigned to satisfy both the pro and the amateur basketball player.

game.name: Nba 2k9
game.desc: NBA 2K9 is a basketball simulation for Xbox 360. The inclusion of high definition improves the rendering of faces, eye movements and audience. New defensive styles, shots, dunks and free throws clearly differentiate the players. On the court, the artificial intelligence of teammates and opponents adapts to your game. Up to four players can compete online, two locally.

game.name: NBA Ballers : Chosen One
game.desc: NBA Ballers: Chosen One on Xbox 360 is a basketball simulation that allows you to play as more than 65 stars of the American league. If you can't find what you're looking for, you can create your own player. The title is arcade-oriented and is part of a "street" lineage that includes 1 vs 1 or 2 vs 2 matches. Winning is not the only thing that counts, you also have to score with style and dunk like a pro, stringing together combos to unlock great moves.

game.name: Nba Jam
game.desc: Electronic Arts decided to resurrect the arcade game NBA Jam by launching its remake on 360. NBA Jam is a basketball game in which you lead a team of two players in 2D basketball matches. The spirit of the original game has been kept, with the famous dunk, turbo and defense sending; however, the mega dunks make their appearance in this 360 version.

game.name: Nba Live 08
game.desc: NBA Live 08 on Xbox 360 is a basketball simulation featuring the biggest names in the American league. Take control with moves that allow you to win face-offs from anywhere on the court. Scream your way to the floor in great match-ups and dunk contests. You can customize your games and play according to your own game script.

game.name: Nba Live 09
game.desc: NBA Live 09 is a basketball simulation on Xbox 360 with an enhanced license: 24 national teams compete in an international tournament, including France, Spain and the United States. In multiplayer, ten players can play together in five-on-five. It is also possible to create your own online league.

game.name: Nba Live 10
game.desc:
NBA Live 10 is a simulation of the basketball sport. As usual the player controls the athletes himself and tries to perform typical basketball maneuvers with his gamepad. He can choose between playing a whole season, play-offs or the FIBA World Championship. In the Dynasty Mode the player takes the role of the executive of a basketball team which means he has to grapple with managerial tasks like transfers or training.
The most important feature of NBA Live 10 is the so-called "Dynamic DNA" which synchronizes the in-game statistics over the internet with the current data from the real league. In comparison to NBA Live 09 most new features are changes to the core game mechanics; especially the defense. Attempts to score now use just one button in combination with the analog sticks.

game.name: Nba Street Homecourt
game.desc: NBA Street Homecourt is a basketball game for Xbox 360. Halfway between world-class gymnasts and professional basketball players, the players you play as can perform numerous style tricks and diabolical sequences to make fools of their opponents and score the maximum number of points. Many game modes are available, as well as a multiplayer mode (4 players Offline and 2 players Online).

game.name: Ncis
game.desc: Similar to the CSI games, NCIS is also based on a crime TV series, but instead of casting the player in a role of rookie investigator, you get to control all the major characters from the series themselves. The gameplay is a mix of exploring and forensics. While exploring and looking for evidence is done in 3rd-person perspective, all the forensics mini-games draw inspiration from the techniques used in the CSI games.nnnnThe story is told through four episodes that use same video effects and a type of humor seen in the TV series. What seems to have started as a simple bank robbery escalates into dangerous terrorist conspiracy and a nuclear threat.

game.name: Need for Speed - Carbon
game.desc: Need for Speed Carbon is a racing game for Xbox 360. The title takes place in the beautiful city of Palmont City, where you are asked to become the king of asphalt and burn, by conquering the many districts of the city and accepting to participate in all the races and competitions that come your way. Of course, the police are on hand in case you break the law.

game.name: Need for Speed : Hot Pursuit
game.desc: After years of street racing and closed circuits, Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit returns to the series' roots - scenic tracks, cops versus racers face-off, and, of course, exotic and super cars.nnnnThe game is set in the Seacrest County, the land of sunny beaches, snowy mountains, hot deserts and high forests. Its roads are extremely popular within racers community and, hereupon, are filled with cars from all over the world. Because of that, the local police department has to be at one level with law violators in order to keep citizens safe.nnnnYou begin the career as a racer and a cop simultaneously. Each one has 20 ranks to achieve, gaining in reward new cars. The racing events are divided into four groups, based on participating car types: sports, performance, super, exotic and hyper, unlocked only when the previous one is finished. Unlike the similar Burnout Paradise, they are accessible only from the map.

game.name: Need for Speed : Most Wanted
game.desc: A reboot of the 2005 release, Need for Speed: Most Wanted is a racing game for Xbox 360 that offers the opportunity to challenge the police through various car chases. The goal here is to collect infractions while avoiding the police in order to become the most wanted driver. Several types of cars are available (sports cars, supercars, muscle cars) and an open environment serves as your playground.

game.name: Need for Speed : The Run
game.desc: In Need for Speed: The Run, the player steps into the shoes of Jackson "Jack" Rourke. After an occurrence leaves him with a bad standing with an crime organization, Jack becomes targeted and must flee for his life. The consequences leave him owing large amounts of money, which he cannot pay. His friend, Sam Harper, directs him to a massive street racing event called "The Run". The Run is a 3000 mile race across the United States, from San Francisco to New York City. She informs him the prize money, $25 million, is more than enough for his freedom but he would have to beat 200 other drivers to win. nnnnPlayers can participate in an "underground world of illicit, high stakes racing" in a race from San Francisco to New York. There are stops through Las Vegas, Denver, Detroit, and tons of other locations. This is the first title in the Need for Speed series to use real locations.

game.path: ./Games/Need for Speed Most Wanted A Criterion Game [RF].iso
game.name: Need for Speed Most Wanted A Criterion Game [RF]
Need For Speed Rivals
game.desc: Need for Speed: Rivals is an open world racing game and the 20th installment in this series. Like Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit it supports two storylines: The Racer and The Cop (with three separate paths: patrol, enforcer, or undercover). Both have a full career progression, through speedlists for the racer and assignments for the cop. Players level up by completing objectives. There are gadgets such as an EMPs, shockwaves and the ability to call in roadblocks that can be upgraded. The game takes place in the fictional location Redview County. It is an open world with 160 km (100 miles) of streets.nnnnThe game still incorporates the Autolog system and introduces AllDrive, which allows the player to seamlessly transition from the single-player game to online multiplayer, both cooperatively and head-to-head.

game.name: Neverdead
game.desc: NeverDead is a third-person shooter starring protagonist Bryce Boltzmann. He is a demon hunter of over 500 years old who was cursed with immortality after he witnessed the murder of his wife by the hands of demon king Astaroth. This event turned him into a raging alcoholic who spouts vulgarities. In the modern days where the game takes place, he hunts down demons for cash as a private investigator together with his cold, female partner Arcadia Maximille. The storyline follows the events when they investigate a demonic invasion that nearly destroyed a city.nnnnMuch of the game is built around the immortality, an unusual trait for a game character. Even though his physical appearance can be wounded or eviscerated, he can never completely be destroyed. While Bryce attacks hordes of enemies using a variety of firearms along with a sword, and dodges, blocks, and performs evasive maneuvers, his main worry is keeping his limbs together.

game.name: Nhl 13
game.desc: NHL 13 is an ice hockey simulation available on Xbox 360. It is possible to create your own player and request a transfer in the Become a Pro mode, or to play as a General Manager, alone or online, in leagues of up to 750 players. The player can also relive the highlights of the 2011-2012 and 2012-2013 seasons, pad in hand.

game.name: Nickelodeon : Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
game.desc: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles is a beat 'em up game based on the 2012 television series developed by Nickelodeon. The game takes place in New York. The four turtles Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello and Raphael are ambushed by Foot Soldiers. It turns out that the Foot Soldiers created a Mutagen bomb to mutate the whole city. The turtles eventually stop this treat, but a sudden call gets them on edge again. April O'Neil has been kidnapped by Shredder and he demands Splinter. The turtles fight their way through Foot Soldiers, Kraang, Baxter Stockman and his Mousers to be able to defeat Shredder and save April.

game.name: NieR
game.desc: Nier for Xbox 360 is an action-RPG that plunges you into a world plagued by darkness and invaded by unknown creatures. Play as an unyielding hero named Nier who is on a quest of his own: to find a cure to save his daughter who is infected by a strange disease. Accompanied by your powerful allies and a mysterious power, prepare for intense and violent battles.

game.path: ./Games/Night at the Museum Battle of the Smithsonian [RF].iso
game.name: Night at the Museum Battle of the Smithsonian [RF]
Otomedius Excellent
game.desc: Otomedius Excellent offers a single-player campaign and a multi-player mode provided via the Xbox Live service. If stages are too hard, the player can recruit up to three helpers in the Multiplay offline mode. In Score Attack new weapon cards can be unlocked after finishing the main game. Through Xbox Live online multiplayer is possible and new content can be unlocked. There are also several new characters, several extra stages and several character BGM packs that are available through downloadable content.

game.name: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures
game.desc:
Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures is a 3D platform game based on the cartoon TV series of same name. Pac, Cylindria and Spiral are called to the lab of Sir C. He shows them three golden globes he found and explains that they need to be recharged with Globe energy orbs. And asks if you can help him with collecting the energy orbs. At this point four ghosts appear to warn them that Betrayus, lord of the ghosts, and his army have invaded the city of Pacoplis. Betrayus seems to have stolen some kind of freeze machine from the science center. It's up to you to stop him and his army and collecting the energy orbs needed to power the globes of Sir C along the way.
Pac-Man can enter several modes to help him defeat enemies and overcome obstacles. The modes are: Chameleon Pac, Fire Pac, Granite ball Pac, Ice Pack, Metal Pac, Spin Pac.
The game offers a multiplayer mode of up to four players.

game.name: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures 2
game.desc:
Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures 2 is a 3D platform game based on the cartoon TV series of same name and it is the sequel to Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures. Betrayus, lord of the ghosts, and his servants come up with a plan to let Pac-Man steal the repository holding the Pac world bodies of all the ghosts in the Netherworld. It is now up to you to thwart this evil plan.
Pac-Man can enter two new modes: PacKong: transforms you in to a ape like creature with great strength; PacZilla: this transforms you into a giant.

game.name: Payday 2
game.desc: Payday 2 is a first-person shooter for Xbox 360. With three other players, you organise a heist and try to escape with your loot. You can stay low-key and never set off any alarms, or you can charge in and confront law enforcement. Some elements of the missions are random, forcing you to change your plans with each game.

game.name: Perfect Dark Zero
game.desc: Perfect Dark Zero for Xbox 360 explores Joanna Dark's past as a young mercenary working with her father. In this first-person shooter, you'll have your work cut out for you to discover the truth behind your father's death. From DataDyne to Carrington, it's up to you to make the best use of your weapons and gadgets to save yourself.

game.name: Persona 4 : Arena Ultimax
game.desc: Persona 4: Arena Ultimax for Xbox 360 is a fighting game developed by Atlus and featuring the cast of the popular RPG Persona 4.

game.name: Phantasy Star Universe
game.desc: Phantasy Star Universe for Xbox 360 is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game. Customise your hero and explore three huge planets. Pilot vehicles and move to exterminate a new alien threat. You are Ethan Weber and you are the last hope of an entire universe.

game.path: ./Games/Phineas And Ferb Quest For Cool Stuff [NTSCU].iso
game.name: Phineas And Ferb Quest For Cool Stuff [NTSCU]
Pimp My Ride
game.desc: A videogame adaptation of the TV show presented by Xzibit, Pimp my Ride on Xbox 360 invites players to transform dilapidated cars into rolling palaces. To do this, you must first accumulate funds by roaming the streets of Pimp City and playing various mini-games, then visit the various spare parts suppliers.

game.name: Pinball Hall of Fame Williams Collection [NTSCU]

game.path: ./Games/Pirates of the Caribbean At Worlds End [RF].iso
game.name: Pirates of the Caribbean At Worlds End [RF]
Plants vs Zombies : Garden Warfare
game.desc: Plants vs. Zombies: Garden Warfare is a first-person shooter available on Xbox 360. The player chooses his side (plants or zombies) and engages in crazy and funny battles involving up to 24 people.

game.name: Portal 2
game.desc:
Portal 2 is the sequel to Portal and offers the same first-person puzzle-platform gameplay. Players continue the story taking the role of the young woman Chell, who defeated the artificial intelligence computer system GLaDOS in the first game. After the events of the first game, she was placed in stasis until eventually woken up again. The sequel still takes place at Aperture Science Labs, but it is now overrun by decay and nature. Much more than in the first game, Chell moves past the clean test chambers and explores the gloomy industrial setting of the laboratory.
Just like in the first game, the gameplay is based around portals. By shooting a starting portal and ending portal at suitable surfaces, certain uncrossable gaps can be bridged. Just like in the first game, there are also many test chambers where puzzles need to be solved, using cubes, turrets, platforms and special portal tricks to gain a lot of speed.

game.name: Prey
game.desc: Prey on Xbox 360 is a first-person shooter in which you play as Tommy, a Cherokee Indian who is forced into a spaceship with his girlfriend. Equipped with living weapons and supernatural powers from his bloodline, Tommy will have to find his beloved by destroying the alien as it should be. It's up to you to play with your environment and gravity to get out of this one unscathed.

game.name: Prince Of Persia
game.desc: Prince of Persia on 360 is a platform/action game with an emphasis on acrobatics and epic duels. The prince returns from a long adventure, loaded with a sumptuous treasure. During a sandstorm, he finds himself catapulted into a wonderful garden and confronted with the destruction of the tree of life. Ahriman, the spirit of evil and destruction, is released. It is up to our hero, accompanied by Princess Elika, to lock evil back into its prison.

game.name: Prince of Persia - The Forgotten Sands
game.desc: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands is a chapter in the Sands of Time saga to be discovered on Xbox 360. It takes place between episodes 1 and 2 of the original trilogy and sees the Prince visiting his brother's kingdom. Everything changes when his brother unleashes an army of demonic creatures on his own kingdom, believing them to be the army of King Solomon. New powers related to the control of nature make their appearance in this episode.

game.name: Prison Break : The Conspiracy
game.desc: Prison Break on Xbox 360 is an action game based on the television series of the same name. It recounts the events of the first season but from a new perspective. Indeed, the player embodies Tom Paxton, an agent in charge of investigating the reason why Michael Scofield robbed a bank and ended up in Fox River Penitentiary.

game.path: ./Games/The Lord of the Rings War of the North [RF].iso
game.name: The Lord of the Rings War of the North [RF]
The Outfit
game.desc: The Outfit is an action/strategy game for Xbox 360 in which you lead three mercenaries parachuted behind enemy lines, far from the landing beaches. Move through fully destructible scenery and environments, and use dozens of vehicles. Manage your supply points (tank drops, machine gun nests, anti-tank guns, air strikes, etc.) to hold your strategic sites.

game.name: The Peanuts Movie Snoopys Grand Adventure [RF]
The Saboteur
game.desc: In The Saboteur on Xbox 360, relive the infiltration of the Second World War and go behind enemy lines to foil their plans in total stealth. Trap, kill, spy, all while remaining in the dark. Your skills will make a difference.

game.name: The Smurfs 2
game.desc: Smurfs 2 for Xbox 360 is a platform game in which the player can play as up to 9 different Smurfs, each with a special move at their disposal. Go through the 30 levels to eliminate Gargamel and save Smurfette!

game.name: The Walking Dead : Survival Instinct
game.desc: The Walking Dead Survival Instinctc is an Xbox 360 FPS based on the television series of the same name. To get away from the prowlers, brothers Daryl and Merle Dixon try to reach Atlanta. Their path is full of pitfalls and they will have to be very discreet at times to escape the numerous zombies.

game.name: The Witcher 2 Assassins of Kings GOTY [NTSCU][DVD1]
The Witcher 2 Assassins of Kings GOTY [NTSCU][DVD2]
The Wolf Among Us
game.desc: Based on the award-winning Fables comic book series by Bill Willingham (published by DC Comics' Vertigo imprint), The Wolf Among Us is a dark, often brutally violent, and mature take on the characters and creatures of fairytale and legend.

game.name: Thief
game.desc: Thief is set in a fictional world inspired by Victorian and steampunk aesthetics. Garrett, a master thief who has been away from his hometown for a long time, returns to it, a city named 'The City', and finds it ruled over by a tyrant called 'The Baron'. While The City is infested by a plague, the rich continue to live in good fortune, and Garrett intends to exploit the situation to his favor

game.name: Thor : Dieu du Tonnerre
game.desc: Thor: God of Thunder is a third-person action game based on the 2011 movie on the same name, which is in turn based on the Marvel comics series. Set in the world based on Norse mythology, he must save the fictional Asgard realm. Because of Loki's treachery, Thor finds himself defending his city Asgard and travelling to Niflheim, Vanaheim and Muspelheim to save Asgard from total destruction. Thor, alone with his legendary hammer, Mjolnir, must fight enemies of an immense scale in melee brawler style while controlling the elemental storm powers of lightning, thunder and wind to vanquish enemies from a distance using long-ranged attacks. There is also a grapple mechanic used for more devastating attacks. The hammer can be powered up to be hurled at enemies as well.

game.name: Tiger Woods Pga Tour 06
game.desc: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 06 on Xbox 360 is a rather realistic golf simulation. Topspin, backspin, spin, it's up to you to play as accurately as possible to put the ball in the hole. A career mode spanning thirty years is available, as well as challenges against specific rivals. All this on fifteen courses and against nineteen opponents from the professional golf world.

game.name: Tiger Woods Pga Tour 07
game.desc: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 07 is a golf game for Xbox 360. In addition to the fast game and the online mode, there are no less than 10 challenges, one of which, Traditionnal Game Modes, is itself broken down into 9 other challenges. You can play on the greens and play hard, to be the one who will make the best card to reach the level of the famous Tiger Woods.

game.name: Tiger Woods Pga Tour 08
game.desc: Discover your passion for the greens with Tiger Woods PGA Tour 08 on Xbox 360. The game features a new gameplay recording feature that you can share online. Raise the bar by posting your greatest moments or take on challenges set by other players to show who is the best golfer in the world. But your opponents will be watching for the slightest misstep and will do everything they can to undermine your confidence.

game.name: Tiger Woods Pga Tour 10
game.desc: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 10 is a golf game for Xbox 360. Experience the thrill of high-level golf as you play in front of dense crowds and hear the clamor of spectators on every hole. For the first time in the franchise's history, take on one of golf's greatest challenges: the U.S. Open at Bethpage Black. The title features an online tournament to compete against other players!

game.name: Tiger Woods Pga Tour 11
game.desc: The golf star returns to Xbox 360 with Tiger Woods PGA Tour 11. This sixth installment in the eponymous golf simulation series offers a number of new features, including the licensing of the Ryder Cup, revamped gameplay and a new view. The title also features online play with up to 24 players. The game also features a host of golf stars including Boo Weekley, Danny Lee, Paul Casey and many more.

game.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 12 : The Masters
game.desc: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 12: The Masters on Xbox 360 marks the addition of the Masters at Augusta National Golf Club to the series. In addition to this mode, the game allows users to challenge Tiger Woods by attempting to beat the scores he achieved during each of the Masters finals he won. A career mode is also included, as well as twenty professional players including Zach Johnson and Bubba Watson.

game.name: Tiger Woods Pga Tour 13
game.desc: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 13 is a golf simulation for Xbox 360 that allows you to follow Tiger's career from cradle to grave. There are 15 courses to choose from, as well as new online features and badges to earn various privileges. A new swing system is also available to play shots of unparalleled precision.

game.path: ./Games/Tiger Woods PGA Tour 14 - Master Historic Edition [PAL][NTSCU].iso
game.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 14 - Master Historic Edition [PAL][NTSCU]
Timeshift
game.desc: TimeShift is a first-person action game for Xbox 360 in which the player has the power to control time. They can speed up, freeze or rewind time while moving freely to surprise their enemies. The storyline takes us on the hunt for a mad scientist who has created an alternative future in which he dominates the world. There is also a multiplayer mode that allows players to compete over the Internet.

game.name: Titanfall
game.desc: Set in a distant frontier torn apart by war, Titanfall gives players the freedom to switch between fighting as elite assault Pilots or agile, heavily armored, 24-foot tall Titans. The advanced warfare of tomorrow gives you the freedom to fight your way as both elite assault Pilot and agile, heavily armored Titan. Online gameplay is core to the Titanfall experience, as fast-paced multiplayer action is combined with heroic moments from traditional campaign mode.

game.name: Tna Impact!
game.desc: Step into the ring and battle mountains of muscle in TNA Impact! for Xbox 360. Create your own wrestler or play as one of the 25 iconic figures available in this game inspired by the American TV show of the same name. Send your opponent to the mat or into the ropes with the various techniques available and become the king of the arena!

game.name: Tom Clancy's Endwar
game.desc: EndWar for Xbox 360 is set in the context of a hypothetical World War III. Using a voice command system, the player must lead one of three rival factions into battle and capture strategic points that provide access to tactical support weapons. Playable in single-player, EndWar places a strong emphasis on multiplayer, with an innovative mode that allows players to evolve frontlines on a global map until final victory is achieved.

game.name: Tom Clancy's H.a.w.x. 2
game.desc: H.A.W.X. 2 is an air combat game for Xbox 360 based on the universe of the American novelist Tom Clancy. At the controls of a multitude of aircraft, the player embodies three pilots of different origins and tries to avoid the declaration of an international conflict.

game.name: Tomb Raider - Underworld
game.desc: The adventures of explorer Lara Croft continue in this 8th installment for Xbox 360 entitled Underworld. In this episode, the intrepid Lara will attempt to unravel the mysteries surrounding her mother's disappearance. Our globetrotter will have to recover Thor's hammer in order to face the demons of the past. This new action/platform game is more than ever a throwback to the original Tomb Raider.

game.name: Tomb Raider Legend
game.desc: The most famous explorer of all time arrives in a new adventure illustrated by Tomb Raider Legend on Xbox 360. Lara Croft is on a quest to find one of the world's most precious treasures, a weapon that can bring peace to the world but also bring about its downfall. Avoid traps along the way, fight enemies vying for the same loot and use her acrobatic skills to get through.

game.name: Tony Hawk Shred
game.desc: Tony Hawk Shred is a sliding game for Xbox 360 sold with a skateboard-shaped accessory. The title offers both skateboarding and snowboarding events. You control your avatar by leaning on the accessory and passing your hands in front of the light sensors.

game.name: Tony Hawk's American Wasteland
game.desc: You are a new skater in the city of L.A.. The main drive of the game is that your hanging around with a skating group and its leader, who also happens to be a skating legend, at their skate park in Beverly Hills called Skate Ranch. Throughout the game you must help your friends by getting skate pieces for Skate Ranch.

game.name: Tony Hawk's Project 8
game.desc: Tony Hawk's Project 8 is a skateboarding game for Xbox 360. Eighth of the name, the game remains faithful to its game system and its gameplay. You play as a contender for the title of skateboarding king, and you have to prove your worth and your level by climbing the ladder little by little.

game.name: Too Human
game.desc: The war between men and machines is raging, deadly fighting is taking place and threatening the extinction of the human race. To restore the balance of power, the gods send one of theirs on the forehead: the Baldur warrior that you will embody. Too Human on Xbox 360 takes the form of an action game tinged with role play. His universe mixes science fiction and Scandinavian mythology and can be browsed two on Xbox Live.

game.name: Top Gun : Hard Lock
game.desc: Top Gun: Hard Lock is an aerial simulation for Xbox 360. Based on the hit movie from the 80's, Top Gun: Hard Lock takes place in the present day. The game features new aviators straight out of the famous Top Gun Academy. Fight at high speed in your F-14 Tomcat and many other original machines.

game.name: Top Spin 2
game.desc: Top Spin 2 is a 2006 tennis video game developed by Indie Built and originally published by 2K Sports. It is the sequel to Top Spin. Top Spin 2 includes 24 playable professional tennis players including today's superstars, and retired.

game.name: Top Spin 3
game.desc: The third game in the Top Spin series updates the concept of the previous two tennis titles with some new features. The most important change is that more control is given back to the player, levelling the difficulty. In the previous version the AI took control of timing and positing, players only needed to press a button for shots, and keeping it pressed longer made them harder. In this edition the player controls the power of the shot, the positioning of the player and the timing needed to perform a successful swing. When the player needs to run to reach the ball, it will never be as precise as powerful as when already in position. Most of these changes are gradually introduced in the tennis school, where players are trained to become familiar with the new controls.

game.name: Top Spin 4
game.desc: Top Spin 4 is a tennis game for Xbox 360. Choose from among the greatest athletes in the sport to play as and win tournaments with a multitude of technical shots in a game based on realism and simulation.

game.name: Tornado Outbreak
game.desc: Tornado Outbreak for Xbox 360 puts you in the shoes of a real tornado to wreak havoc in 11 worlds filled with destructible elements. To prevent you from doing so, the evil wisps will be hiding among the human world. It's up to you to find them by destroying everything in your path! A cooperative mode is also included.

game.name: Toy Story 3
game.desc: The Xbox 360 action game Toy Story 3 is a faithful adaptation of the film's storyline in which Buzz, Woody and his friends must come to terms with their uncertain future as Andy prepares to enter college. The title features several game modes, including a co-op mode and a level editor.

game.name: Toy Story Mania!
game.desc: Meet the iconic characters from the Toy Story movie in this party game available on Xbox 360. Toy Story Mania! features more than 50 speed, skill and reflex mini-games set in the fun world of the carnival.

game.name: Transformers : Rise of the Dark Spark
Trivial Pursuit
game.desc: Trivial Pursuit on Xbox 360 is the videogame adaptation of the famous board game that has brought so many evenings to life in our homes. On the occasion of its 25th anniversary, discover a host of new questions, new game modes and numerous options on your console to guarantee a unique experience.

game.name: Tron Evolution
game.desc: Tron Evolution is played through a classic third-person perspective, similar to the Tomb Raider series. However, Anon - the player's character - is much more athletic than a typical character for this genre, and the player is able to travel across The Grid using Anon's "free runner" aerobatic techniques. The player attacks hostile Programs primarily with their Light Disk, through either melee or ranged attacks. They can also use the disk to block the attacks of other Programs. Derezzing (in-universe slang for killing/deleting) a Program grants experience points, which can be used to upgrade the player's abilities. The game also includes sequences where the player can control Light Cycles (like TRON 2.0) and Tanks (upgraded versions of the ones from the first movie).

game.name: Tropico 3
game.desc: The management game Tropico 3 for Xbox 360 puts you in charge of an island where you must take care of everything to keep your fellow citizens happy during the Cold War. Whether you're a wise or despotic leader, you can choose which president you want to play by choosing his characteristics and guiding his policies. The game also offers an editor to create an island from scratch.

game.name: Tropico 4
game.desc: Tropico 4 on Xbox 360 puts you in charge of a banana republic in a world that is changing rapidly due to the rise of the superpowers and the emergence of globalisation and the market economy. Your dictator must therefore face new enemies and new challenges, but fortunately he has new support, starting with the ministers he can choose to pass the most controversial decisions.

game.name: Tropico 5
game.desc: Welcome back to the tropical island of Tropico in Tropico 5. This time the player rules the island from the 19th to the 20th century, starting as governor for the colony before releasing the grip of the motherland. During the years two world wars and the cold war era have to be mastered. There are other islands nearby and also some super powers, which may allies, trading partners (for the new trade fleet) or dangerous foes. As the time passes by new technologies and buildings become available, while other buildings are obsolete and need to be replaced to stay up to date.

game.name: Turning Point : Fall Of Liberty
game.desc: Turning Point: Fall Of Liberty on Xbox 360 is a first-person shooter set in an alternate past, one in which the United States has been invaded by Nazi Germany. The player takes on the role of Dan Carson, a construction worker who soon joins the American resistance.

game.name: Turok
game.desc: Turok is an epic, story-driven FPS game set on a dark, mysterious planet in the near future. Players take on the role of Joseph Turok, a former Black Ops commando, now part of an elite Special Forces squad on a mission to take down a war criminal on a genetically-altered planet.

game.name: Two Worlds
game.desc: Two Worlds is a role-playing game for Xbox 360. Set in a medieval fantasy world torn apart by the war against the orcs, you play as a bounty hunter who must investigate the mysterious disappearance of his sister. Immerse yourself in an intense quest, and play up to 8 players per instance (internet only).

game.name: Two Worlds II
game.desc: Two Worlds II on Xbox 360 is a role-playing game that plunges you into the heart of the medieval fantasy kingdom of Antaloor. You play as the same hero as in the first episode, this time imprisoned in the jails of the mysterious Gandohar. Your hope of finding your sister is diminishing day by day, until your sworn enemies the Orcs free you. Regain your freedom and fight the forces of evil, and perhaps you will discover Gandohar's dark past...

game.name: Uefa Euro 2008
game.desc: Choose your team from the 53 available and lead them to the UEFA Euro 2008 final on Xbox 360 on all 8 official pitches. Compete alone or with friends within a team to see who will become captain. Create your own player and put him on the pitch, compete against others in an online mode to score points for your country.

game.name: Ultimate Marvel Vs. Capcom 3
game.desc: Ultimate Marvel vs. Capcom 3 is a fighting game for Xbox 360. Compared to the original version, this version brings 12 new fighters including Phoenix Wright, Strider, Firebrand, Ghost Rider and Hawkeye. 8 new battle arenas, as well as online improvements are to be noted, such as a Spectator mode to watch online games.

game.name: Ultra Street Fighter IV
game.desc: Ultra Street Fighter 4 includes Edition Select, which lets you pick from the various versions of the characters from all the games released in the Street Fighter 4 series. At character select, you can pick the version of the fighter from SF4, SSF4, SSF4AE, SSF4 AE Ver. 2012 and Ultra Street Fighter 4. This means, of course, that vanilla Sagat, who was nerfed by later versions of the game, can go up against the rebalanced characters from Ultra. "In all the years that I've been playing through the SF4 series, I can't count how many times discussions on 'who the strongest character has been thus far' have come up among players both old and new," Capcom's Peter Rosas, himself a former tournament player, wrote on Capcom Unity. "Seeing of how there was no actual way to measure whether vanilla SF4 Sagat was stronger than AE Yun, players would engage in long theoretical discussions with no way to figure out who was right. Well, time to change that in Ultra SF!"

game.name: Universe at War : Earth Assault
game.desc: Tired of defending the Earth from constant alien invasions? With Universe at War: Earth Assault on Xbox 360, take control of one of three alien factions that have come to conquer our beautiful blue planet. In this strategy game, humans are relegated to the rank of victims, or even resources. The title offers 3 campaigns, a skirmish mode and scenarios that are far from the main plot. A multiplayer mode allows you to compete online.

game.name: Unreal Tournament III
game.desc: The Unreal Tournament series is back on Xbox 360 with this third installment that is more explosive than ever. Alone or in teams, on foot or in vehicles, fight your enemies and conquer territories using a devastating arsenal to dominate the game. Challenge your friends online in the multiplayer mode this game is made for.

game.name: Vampire Rain
game.desc: Vampire Rain is an action-adventure game for Xbox 360. The title is very infiltration-oriented, and pits you against bloodthirsty vampires, especially when it's your own. Here, the slightest misstep can be fatal, as the vampires are fast and formidable. Vampire Rain is also playable in 8 player multiplayer.

game.name: Vanquish
game.desc: Vanquish on Xbox 360 is a third-person shooter that plunges you into a futuristic world. Russia has started a major new conflict and American forces must retake a space colony that has fallen under the control of a horde of robots. In this context, you play as Sam Gideon, a DARPA agent equipped with combat armour capable of increasing human capabilities tenfold.

game.name: Venetica
game.desc: Venetica on Xbox 360 is a very action-oriented role-playing game. You play as a young woman fighting fiercely against hordes of bloodthirsty demons. The particularity of the universe is to make you constantly oscillate between the world of life and death, in search of new powers. All of this in settings very reminiscent of Italian Renaissance cities.

game.name: Viking : Battle for Asgard
game.desc: Viking is an action game mixing one-on-ten combat and mass battle. This cross between God of War and Dynasty Warriors takes advantage of Norse mythology to bring a scenario tinged with magic and barbarism. Offering three islands to test the various combos at our disposal, this Xbox 360 title from The Creative Assembly doesn't skimp on the gore to underline the warrior nature of the hero.

game.name: Virtua Fighter 5
game.desc: Fifth of the name, the title revives the characters that made its history (Akira Yuki, Pai Chan or the ninja Kagemaru) and introduces new ones for a total of 18 fighters. A quest mode is present, allowing you to progress at your own pace and unlock many bonuses.

game.name: Virtua Tennis 2009
game.desc: Virtua Tennis 2009 on Xbox 360 is an arcade-oriented title. It allows you to play alone or with others, on the same machine or online, and to play as the world's greatest tennis stars such as Nadal, Federer and Murray for men or Ivanovic for women. In addition, this edition includes a player editor that can be customised with 800 items from the Tennis Store. Finally, for the first time in the history of the series, the game is based on the Davis Cup licence.

game.name: Virtua Tennis 3
game.desc: Virtua Tennis 3 is a game of... Tennis on Xbox 360. It allows you to play as the greatest players on the world circuit, or to create your own avatar to start a career world that aims to make you the new world number 1. More than 34 tournaments are available, as well as original training phases and the possibility of unlocking numerous bonuses to equip your player.

game.name: Virtua Tennis 4
game.desc: Virtua Tennis 4 on Xbox 360 is a tennis game in which the player has 4 seasons to reach the top of the world hierarchy and win the 4 major tournaments. The mini-games, dear to the series, are there and allow you to play against up to 3 other players.

game.name: Viva Piñata
game.desc: Viva Piñata on Xbox 360 is a management game in which the player must take care of a garden. Ploughing, sowing, watering... Here are some of the activities that await you to beautify your plot. All of this with the aim of attracting Piñatas, animal cuddly toys of various species. Of course, you have to take care of these creatures by fulfilling their basic needs and seeing them reproduce.

game.name: Viva Piñata : Party Animals
game.desc: The colourful little world of Viva Piñata is now available in a party game called Party Animals on Xbox 360. The candy-filled creatures compete against each other in a series of crazy mini-games. There are fifty of them, divided into seven categories: shooting, reflexes, rhythm, races, fights... Control the creature of your choice and compete against up to three of your friends on the same console and many more online via Xbox Live.

game.name: Wall-e
game.desc: Adapted from the Disney-Pixar animated feature film, this Xbox 360 title allows players to relive the most exciting moments of the film at the controls of the little robot Wall-E and his sidekick EVE. Experience the film's environment and some never-before-seen settings in a futuristic adventure game across 10 different worlds and multiplayer challenges.

game.name: Warhammer : Battle March
game.desc: Warhammer: Mark of Chaos: Battle March is a strategy game for Xbox 360 that is close to the original board game. Finely crafted tactics for violent confrontations between 6 armies, this is what makes up this title, which combines the two opuses released on PC. Note also the presence of a multiplayer mode.

game.name: Warriors Orochi 2
game.desc: Warriors Orochi 2 on 360 once again merges the worlds of Dynasty Warriors and Samurai Warriors into a frenetic beat'em all. With no less than 90 playable characters, combo attacks, and a brand new Versus mode, this second episode is not short on content to satisfy the many fans of the series.

game.name: Warriors Orochi 3
game.desc: Warriors Orochi 3 is a beat'em all for Xbox 360. Gathering heroes from the different Warriors series but also from Ninja Gaiden or Dead or Alive, this episode offers us to relive the battles of the past to save up to 120 characters and face a terrible giant hydra. A level editor is also available to create your own stories.

game.name: Watchmen the End Is Nigh Parts 1-2 [RF]
Way Of The Samurai 3
game.desc: Way of the Samurai 3 on Xbox 360 is an action/adventure game in which you truly decide the fate of your character, a masterless samurai. The story takes place in the heart of feudal Japan and has multiple ramifications depending on the path you decide to take. The game has 21 different endings.

game.name: Wet
game.desc: WET is an action game for Xbox 360. You play as Rubi, a professional killer who wields both a sword and her two pistols and who finds herself involved in a scenario worthy of a Tarantino film. The references and the style are very much inspired by it! Take part in Hollywood gunfights where you have to jump around and grab onto objects while shooting at your enemies to score as many points as possible.

game.name: Wheelman
game.desc: Wheelman on Xbox 360 is a 100% action game with movie star Vin Diesel as the main character. He plays the role of a professional driver who comes out of retirement in Barcelona to protect a woman from his past. Stunts, shoot-outs, street fights and chases are all part of this adrenaline-fuelled game.

game.name: Wipeout Create & Crash
game.desc: Wipeout Create & Crash is a party game for Xbox 360 inspired by the TV show Wipeout. In this game, the candidates must face an obstacle course in a colourful and animated universe. For the first time, it is possible to create your own courses thanks to the editor provided for this purpose.

game.name: Wolfenstein
game.desc: Wolfenstein on Xbox 360 is the third installment of the famous FPS series. The title plunges us once again into the middle of World War II, in the shoes of BJ Blazkowicz. Your mission is to monitor Nazi research into the paranormal. You will quickly be confronted with creations from parallel dimensions opened by Reich scientists.

game.name: Wolfenstein : The New Order
game.desc: Wolfenstein: The New Order for Xbox 360 is an FPS set in an alternate history in which Nazi Germany has won the war and dominates the world. Captain William "B.J." Blazkowicz will join the resistance and try to overthrow the regime by spreading chaos among the enemy troops.

game.name: Wolfenstein : The New Order
game.desc: Wolfenstein: The New Order for Xbox 360 is an FPS set in an alternate history in which Nazi Germany has won the war and dominates the world. Captain William "B.J." Blazkowicz will join the resistance and try to overthrow the regime by spreading chaos among the enemy troops.

game.name: Wolfenstein : The New Order
game.desc: Wolfenstein: The New Order for Xbox 360 is an FPS set in an alternate history in which Nazi Germany has won the war and dominates the world. Captain William "B.J." Blazkowicz will join the resistance and try to overthrow the regime by spreading chaos among the enemy troops.

game.name: Wolfenstein : The New Order
game.desc: Wolfenstein: The New Order for Xbox 360 is an FPS set in an alternate history in which Nazi Germany has won the war and dominates the world. Captain William "B.J." Blazkowicz will join the resistance and try to overthrow the regime by spreading chaos among the enemy troops.

game.name: World Of Tanks
game.desc: World of Tanks on 360 is a free internet downloadable game that invites you to take control of a World War II tank and compete against other players. The title features more than 60 machines based on models used by the United States, Germany and the Soviet Union (more tanks will be added later). The game features a system of upgrades that can be unlocked by earning credits in the field or through an online shop.

game.path: ./Games/World Series of Poker 2007 Tournament of Champions [NTSCU].iso
game.name: World Series of Poker 2007 Tournament of Champions [NTSCU]
game.marquee: ./images/World Series of Poker 2007 Tournament of Champions [NTSCU]-marquee.png
game.thumbnail: ./images/World Series of Poker 2007 Tournament of Champions [NTSCU]-thumb.jpg
game.boxback: ./images/World Series of Poker 2007 Tournament of Champions [NTSCU]-boxback.jpg

game.path: ./Games/World Series of Poker 2008 Battle for the Bracelets [RF].iso
game.name: World Series of Poker 2008 : Battle for the Bracel
game.desc: World Series of Poker 2008: Battle for the Bracelets on Xbox 360 lets you hit the board with the pros without the risk of losing big money. Take on thirty of the world's best players with the sole aim of winning the bracelet in the $100,000 buy-in Main Event. A poker school is also available for beginners who want to get some practice before taking the plunge.
game.fanart: ./images/World Series of Poker 2008 Battle for the Bracelets [RF]-fanart.jpg

game.name: Wwe 2k14
game.desc: FINALLY. 2K Sports' lineup of premier simulation titles expands with the company's first release in the flagship WWE videogame franchise, WWE 2K14. The most electrifying, authentic and comprehensive WWE video game experience to date has arrived. Become Immortal.

game.name: Wwe 2k15
game.desc: The second installment in the WWE 2K series, WWE 2K15 on Xbox 360 is the first to hit the 8th generation of consoles. In this wrestling game, you can play as your favourite wrestler in many different types of matches.

game.name: Wwe 2k16
game.desc: WWE 2K16 is back and badder than ever with the biggest roster of wrestlers in the game's history. Over 120 of the top names in wrestling are here, ready to unleash moves from chokeslams and facebusters to chops, drops, and the dreaded stinkface.

game.name: Wwe Legends Of Wrestlemania
game.desc: WWE Legends of Wrestlemania on Xbox 360 is a fighting game featuring the wrestlers of the past, well known to fans of this bully sport for a laugh. Take on one of these subtle behemoths for fights filled with spectacular falls and deceptively brutal mandates for a real rumble.

game.name: Wwe'12
game.desc: WWE'12 is a fighting game for Xbox 360. You will find all the stars of the ring in this fourteenth opus of the famous franchise. The game offers a few innovations such as adapting your techniques to your opponent's state of health. A new tool also allows us to create our own arenas.

game.name: Wwe'13
game.desc: Relive the Attitude Era of WWE in an all-new, breakthrough, story mode. The new WWE Live? presentation system features a completely overhauled audio system and Spectacular Moments. WWE '13 will be the boldest, smoothest, and most immersive, WWE simulation to date.

game.name: X-blades
game.desc: X-Blades on Xbox 360 features a scantily clad young heroine named Ayumi. An accomplished treasure hunter, she has to fend off the forces of evil and find the artefacts that will allow peace to reign over the world. To do this, she has a real arsenal at her disposal: two swords coupled with pistols, acrobatic skills and elemental magical powers that must be used with care, identifying each enemy precisely.

game.name: Xbox Live Arcade Unplugged
game.desc: Xbox Live Arcade Unplugged on Xbox 360 is actually a compilation of the greatest classic Xbox Live games. Discover Popcap's Bejewled 2, Geometry Wars Retro Evolved, Wik: Fable of Souls, Texas Hold'Em Poker, Outpost Kaloki X and Hardwood Backgammon. Two players can play offline and up to 8 players can play online.

game.name: XCOM : Enemy Unknown
game.desc: XCOM: Enemy Unknown is a game that combines tactics, management and strategy in a secret war against alien invaders. The game puts you in charge of a special organisation mandated to protect the Earth. You must manage your base, develop technologies and train your troops for turn-based battles in various settings. The game also features a competitive multiplayer mode for two players.

game.name: X-men Destiny
game.desc: X-Men: Destiny is an action game with RPG elements putting players in control of one of thee "newly awakening" mutants as they discover their powers, grow stronger, choose sides, and become embroiled in a tricky new conflict.

game.name: X-Men Origins : Wolverine
game.desc: X-Men Origins: Wolverine is an action game for Xbox 360. In parallel with the film of the same name, it offers you to discover the origins of the character Wolverine, from his escape from the bunker where he underwent an adamantium transplant to his time in the African jungle. The combat system incorporates combos but also particularly brutal finish-moves.

game.name: Yaiba : Ninja Gaiden Z
game.desc: Yaiba: Ninja Gaiden Z is a beat'em all for Xbox 360 that puts you in the shoes of a cyborg ninja who must face a zombie invasion. Your goal is to get revenge on Ryu Hayabusa, the central character of the Ninja Gaiden series. Once you have completed the seven missions of the adventure, you have access to an Arcade mode that takes up the basics of old-school beat'em all.

game.name: You Don't Know Jack
game.desc: You Don't Know Jack marks the series' first official box release in about eight years, after YDKJ6: The Lost Gold. The series was almost exclusively for the PC, but the new release has been designed with consoles in mind, while retaining the wit and quirky pop-trivia questions of the famous series and web game.

game.name: Young Justice : Legacy
game.desc: Young Justice: Legacy is a role-playing / action game for Xbox 360. The game allows us to find 12 playable characters including Robin, Nightwing, Super Boy, Batgirl and others. Chaperoned by Batman, Superman or Flash, our superhero troupe will face some notorious villains (Bane, Lex Luthor, Riddler) during 16 missions. Three-player cooperation and power upgrades are also part of the game.

game.name: You're In The Movies
game.desc: In You're in the Movies on Xbox 360, you're the star. Use the USB camera to pose for hilarious short films and invite your friends to play all sorts of characters. Forty mini-games keep you entertained between takes, and a director's mode allows for the most imaginative editing.

game.name: Zoids Assault
game.desc: Zoids Assault on Xbox 360 is a tactical role-playing game featuring animal-shaped mechas inspired by a series of Tomy toys launched in the 1980s. The title features square-by-square, turn-based battles and allows you to heavily modify your troops with a wide selection of equipment.

game.name: Zone Of The Enders Hd Collection
game.desc: The HD remastering process has made Z.O.E. even more striking, re-igniting the thrills for long-time fans and blowing away those discovering the game for the first time. Either way, players will find a combination of hardcore gameplay and compelling story that has become all too rare in this day and age.

game.name: Zuma's Revenge!
game.desc: Experience new levels of ball-blasting action! Leap in and conquer 69 levels of Adventure mode. Discover four new Spirit Animals (at least one of them is a monkey!) and harness their abilities to power up your game. Dive in to the high-stakes Iron Frog mode: 10 levels, one frog. Can you make it out alive? Battle all 8 tiki bosses in the fast-paced Boss Rush. Enter the Weekly Challenge and compete for high score on a new level every week.

game.name: Birds Of Steel
game.desc: Birds of Steel is a flight simulation for Xbox 360. Taking place in the heart of the Second World War, Birds of Steel offers you the chance to fly a hundred planes in as many different levels. Choose your flight mode, from the most advanced simulation to the most accessible arcade mode, to take part in online air battles in co-op with up to 4 players or in melee against 16 other airmen of your calibre.

game.name: BlazBlue : Continuum Shift Extend
game.desc: BlazBlue: Continuum Shift Extend is an expanded version of the PSP/3DS game BlazBlue: Continuum Shift II. It adds the game modes Calamity Trigger Reconstruction (a remastered version of BlazBlue: Calamity Trigger's story mode) and Unlimited Mars Mode (fighting a string of 10 powerful characters with harder AI settings). The Legion mode is no longer available. The player can battle 19 different fighters in Arcade, Versus, Story, Challenge and Abyss modes. This episode sees the appearance of Relius Clover, a character who fights with a strange giant doll.

game.name: Dragon Ball Raging Blast 2
game.desc: You can play as more than 90 characters from the series and the OVAs released to date. Several game modes are available including multiplayer. In addition, there is a 30 minutes anime offered as a bonus.

game.name: Dragon Ball Z Battle of Z [NTSCU]
Dragon Ball Z : Budokai HD Collection
game.desc: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai HD Collection is a compilation of the famous fighting games for Xbox 360. It features Dragon Ball Z Budokai 1 and 3 with HD graphics and the addition of trophy management.

game.name: Dragon Ball Z : Burst Limit
game.desc: Dragon Ball Z: Burst Limit is a fighting game for Xbox 360. The title takes the story of the famous manga (and cartoon) and the scenario of Dragon Ball Z to focus on the invasion of the Earth by Saiyan warriors. Control the twenty or so characters available, with their ultimate moves and techniques. An online mode is available, for numerous long-distance battles.

game.name: Dragon Ball Z Ultimate Tenkaichi
game.desc: Dragon Ball Z Ultimate Tenkaichi is a fighting game for Xbox 360. A new opus dedicated to the universe of Akira Toriyama in which the player takes part in 3D battles in destructible settings against the AI or against other players locally but also online. The game introduces a character creation system.

game.name: Dynasty Warriors 7
game.desc: Dynasty Warriors 7 is an action game that once again invites us to wage war in medieval China on Xbox 360. More than sixty characters capable of wielding 35 different weapons are available to embark on a lengthy story mode or a particularly strategic conquest mode. A tutorial and a vast encyclopaedia are also available to immerse yourself in the exciting world of the Three Kingdoms.

game.name: MXGP : The Official Motocross Videogame
game.desc: MXGP: The Official Motocross Videogame is a racing game available on Xbox 360. The player can experience the career of a professional motocross rider from the MX2 class to MX1. The official riders, teams and circuits of the 2013 season have been modelled for the occasion.

game.name: Nba Live 06
game.desc: NBA Live 06 on Xbox 360 is a basketball simulation featuring the top teams in the American league as well as national teams. The title features a number of different game modes, as well as ultra-realistic motion decomposition of some of the most talked-about players. The whole thing is a relatively realistic simulation of the big-time sport.

game.name: Nba Live 07
game.desc: NBA Live 07 is a basketball game for Xbox 360 based on the famous American national championship. You can play the team of your choice from the Eastern and Western conferences. The game features Dynasty modes, dunk contests, three-point shooting contests and all-star weekends.

game.path: ./Games/Power Gig Rise of The Six String [NTSCU].iso
game.name: Power Gig Rise of The Six String [NTSCU]
Tony Hawk's Proving Ground
game.desc: Tony Hawk's Proving Ground for Xbox 360 features the famous skateboarder and his daredevil crew. Create your own character and develop unique skills based on different skateboarding styles. Transform the environment into a custom skate park, then make your own videos using the included video editor to capture your best tricks and stunts.

game.name: Anarchy Reigns
game.desc: Anarchy Reigns is an action game for Xbox 360. Its creators describe it as an online action/combat game. Indeed, the software includes many multiplayer modes such as Tag Team and Battle Royale modes as well as the possibility to play online. Many fighters are available, each with more extravagant moves than the other.

game.name: Army of Two the Devil Cartel [RF]
